price: 実にアッラー*こそは糧を授けられるお方、強力さの主、力みなぎるお方なのだから。
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
